Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: ~danielhardman points out that any firewall configuration, rather manually, from a script, or with a service like Fail2Ban, does not address DDOS attacks with rotating IP addresses. Perhaps we should close this issue and design a different solution?

Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: Closing this issue. Our focus will instead be on making sure that a flood of messages to the external NIC does not poison the communication on the internal NIC (see INDY-500).
